com.android.car.internal

类 LargeParcelable

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.android.car.internal.LargeParcelableBase
      • com.android.car.internal.LargeParcelable
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class LargeParcelable
extends LargeParcelableBase
    Utility to pass any Parcelable through binder with automatic conversion into shared memory when data size is too big.

    This class can work by itself but child class can be useful to use a custom class to interface with C++ world. For such usage, child class will only add its own CREATOR impl and a constructor taking Parcel in.

    For stable AIDL, this class also provides two methods for serialization toLargeParcelable(Parcelable) and deserialization reconstructStableAIDLParcelable(Parcelable, boolean). Plz check included test for the usage.

      • setClassLoader

        public static void setClassLoader(java.lang.ClassLoader loader)
        Sets ClassLoader for loading the . This should be done before getting binder call. Default classloader may not recognize the Parcelable passed and relevant classloader like package classloader should be set before getting any binder data.

      • getParcelable

      • serializeNullPayload

        protected void serializeNullPayload(Parcel dest)
        从类复制的说明: LargeParcelableBase
        Serialize null payload to the given Parcel. For Parcelable, this can be simply dest.writeParcelable(null) but non-Parcelable should have other way to mark that there is no payload.
        指定者:
        serializeNullPayload 在类中 LargeParcelableBase

      • toLargeParcelable

        public static Parcelable toLargeParcelable(Parcelable p)
        另请参阅:
        #toLargeParcelable(Parcelable, Callable)

      • toLargeParcelable

        public static Parcelable toLargeParcelable(Parcelable p,
                                           java.util.concurrent.Callable<Parcelable> constructEmptyParcelable)
        Prepare a Parcelable defined from Stable AIDL to be able to sent through binder.

        The Parcelable should have a public member having name of STABLE_AIDL_SHARED_MEMORY_MEMBER with ParcelFileDescriptor type.

        If payload size is big, the input would be serialized to a shared memory file and a an empty Parcelable with only the file descriptor set would be returned. If the payload size is small enough to be sent across binder or the input already contains a shared memory file, the original input would be returned.

        参数:
        p - Parcelable the input to convert that might contain large data.
        constructEmptyParcelable - a callable to create an empty Parcelable with the same type as input. If this is null, the default initializer for the input type would be used.
        返回:
        a Parcelable that could be sent through binder despite memory limitation.

      • reconstructStableAIDLParcelable

        public static Parcelable reconstructStableAIDLParcelable(Parcelable p,
                                                         boolean keepSharedMemory)
        Reconstructs Parcelable defined from Stable AIDL. It should have a ParcelFileDescriptor member named STABLE_AIDL_SHARED_MEMORY_MEMBER and will create a new Parcelable if the shared memory portion is not null. If there is no shared memory, it will return the original Parcelable p as it is.
        参数:
        p - Original Parcelable containing the payload.
        keepSharedMemory - Whether to keep created shared memory in the returned Parcelable. Set to true if this Parcelable is sent across binder repeatedly.
        返回:
        a new Parcelable if payload read from shared memory or old one if payload is small enough.
